languages.text: "Владыка Человечества, моя жизнь принадлежит Тебе, ибо я — пылающее орудие веры, что сокрушит еретика, ксеноса и мутанта, посягнувших на царствие Твое".

traits.locale_text: "Владыка Человечества, моя жизнь принадлежит Тебе, ибо я — пылающее орудие веры в Твоих руках, что сокрушит еретика, ксеноса и мутанта, посягнувших на Царство Твое".

languages.text: "Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."
languages.original_text: "Владыка Человечества, моя жизнь принадлежит Тебе, ибо я — пылающее орудие веры, что сокрушит еретика, ксеноса и мутанта, посягнувших на царствие Твое".

traits.locale_text: "Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."
"Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."
"Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."
"Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."
"Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."
"Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."

languages.text: “人类之主啊，我的生命属于您，因为我是炽热的信仰之焰。我必将粉碎一切异端分子、异形与变种人，阻止他们威胁您的王国。”
languages.original_text: "Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."

traits.locale_text: “人类之主啊，我的生命属于您，因为我是炽热的信仰之焰。我必将粉碎一切异端分子、异形与变种人，阻止他们威胁您的王国。”

languages.text: 「人類の盟主よ、この命はあなたに差し出します。{mf|俺|私}は信念の燃え滾る武器です。あなたの帝国に反発した異端者や異種族、変異体はすべて潰します」
languages.original_text: "Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."

traits.locale_text: 「人類の盟主よ、この命はあなたに差し出します。{mf|俺|私}は信念の燃え滾る武器です。あなたの帝国に反発した異端者や異種族、変異体はすべて潰します」

languages.text: «Amo de la humanidad, mi vida le pertenece, pues soy un arma ardiente de fe que aplastará al hereje, al xenos y al mutante que haya levantado una mano contra Su reino».
languages.original_text: "Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."

traits.locale_text: «Amo de la humanidad, mi vida le pertenece, pues soy un arma ardiente de fe que aplastará al hereje, al xenos y al mutante que haya levantado una mano contra Su reino».

languages.text: "Herr der Menschheit, mein Leben gehört Euch, denn ich bin eine flammende Waffe des Glaubens, die den Ketzer, den Xenos und den Mutanten vernichten wird, welche die Hand gegen Euer Königreich erhoben haben."
languages.original_text: "Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."

traits.locale_text: "Herr der Menschheit, mein Leben gehört Euch, denn ich bin eine flammende Waffe des Glaubens, die den Ketzer, den Xenos und den Mutanten vernichten wird, welche die Hand gegen Euer Königreich erhoben haben."

languages.text: « Maître de l'Humanité, ma vie Vous appartient, car je suis une arme animée du feu de la foi, conçue pour détruire les hérétiques, les xénos et les mutants qui ont levé la main contre Votre royaume. »
languages.original_text: "Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."

traits.locale_text: « Maître de l'humanité, ma vie Vous appartient, car je suis une arme animée du feu de la foi, conçue pour détruire les hérétiques, les xénos et les mutants qui ont levé la main contre Votre royaume. »

languages.text: "İnsanlığın Efendisi, benim canım senindir. Ben; inancım uğruna senin krallığına el kaldırmış kâfirleri, zenoları ve mutantları ezecek olan ateşten kılıcım."
languages.original_text: "Master of Mankind, my life belongs to You, for I am a blazing weapon of faith that will crush the heretic, the xenos, and the mutant who have raised a hand against Your kingdom."
